prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Synth Pad, Reed, Drums, but without Guitar.
captions:
1. Piano, Reed, Synth Pad, Drums - no Guitar in this one.
2. No Guitar here - just Piano, Reed, Synth Pad, and Drums.
3. This song features Piano, Reed, Synth Pad, and Drums - no Guitar.
